Class XMLUtility

public class XMLUtility
extends java.lang.Object

The class encapsulates various useful XML utilities

Method Detail

getMandatoryAttribute

protected static org.jdom.Attribute getMandatoryAttribute(org.jdom.Element element,
                                                          java.lang.String attributeName)
                                                   throws ConfigException
Returns an instance of Attribute of attribute under given element. If none exist, raises an exception

Parameters:
element - The element to retrieve the attribute
attributeName - The name of the attribute to retrieve
Returns:
The instance of Attribute
Throws:
ConfigException

getMandatoryIntAttribute

public static int getMandatoryIntAttribute(org.jdom.Element element,
                                           java.lang.String attributeName)
                                    throws ConfigException,
                                           org.jdom.DataConversionException
Returns integer value of attribute with given name of the given element. Raises exception if such attribute does not exist

Parameters:
element - Element to get the value from
attributeName - Name of the attribute
Returns:
value of the attribute
Throws:
ConfigException - if the attribute does not exist
org.jdom.DataConversionException - if the value is not a valid integer

getOptionalIntAttribute

public static int getOptionalIntAttribute(org.jdom.Element element,
                                          java.lang.String attributeName,
                                          int defaultValue)
                                   throws org.jdom.DataConversionException
Returns integer value of attribute with given name of the given element. Returns default value if such attribute does not exist

Parameters:
element - Element to get the value from
attributeName - Name of the attribute
defaultValue - Value to use if there is no such attribute
Returns:
value of the attribute or defaultValue if the attribute does not exist
Throws:
org.jdom.DataConversionException
